EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative. Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
NCS - E Learning Training module
Further to our email dated 2 June 2014 relating to the NCS E Learning. Please note the following:-
When logging in to this, if you are not sure which borough to state, please put the borough that you originally applied for. For a full list of boroughs where we work, please go to http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/where-staff-can-work. If you have any other questions about the e-learning training module, please email Clare Hallas at clarehallas@ncstrust.co.uk. If you have any further questions about working with NCS with The Challenge, please contact your Staffing Associate.
Many thanks for your contribution to NCS. Best Wishes,
NCS with The Challenge
